title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: tool to run Llama 2, Code Llama, and other LLMs locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same surface as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, tools, retrieval, agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (chat-like ChatGPT) that talks to local Ollama instance.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST API; chat, pull, list, delete models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, history, prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement via VS Code extension.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-camunda-bridge
summary: Camunda 8 connector that delegates service tasks to any Ollama model.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for retrieval pipelines using Ollama generators & embedders.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + FAISS in 100 lines.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-made docker-compose stacks adding Postgres, pgvector, and web UI to Ollama.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community registry of custom Modelfile recipes (Llama-2-chat, WizardCoder, etc.).

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query local Ollama models from within notes.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that answers threads using any Ollama model; easy 1-file deploy.
